sentences.english: A good surgical outcome depends on careful evaluation of your eye before the surgery.
sentences.chinese: 好的手术结果依靠术前对你眼睛认真地估测。

sentences.english: The bacteriophage technique was tested to enumerate the bacterial multiplication in leaf tissues of rice.
sentences.chinese: 应用噬菌体法估测了水稻叶片中白叶枯病的增殖。

sentences.english: The third part was conducted to predicting true metabolizable energy (TME) of soybean meal in ducks with enzymatic hydrolyzate gross energy (EHGE).
sentences.chinese: 酶水解物总能值可直接用于估测豆粕的鸭真代谢能值。

sentences.english: The BLUP is a better method in estimating breeding value of boar.
sentences.chinese: 估测青年公猪的育种值，用BLUP法比较好。

sentences.english: To research the availability of a non-invasive method for estimation of human baroreflex function.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨无创估测人体压力反射功能方法的可行性。

sentences.english: The estimation of crop chlorophyll content could provide technical support for precision agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 作物叶绿素含量的估测可以为精准农业提供技术支持。

sentences.english: It is for a discussion of area determination by transect sampling.
sentences.chinese: 这是有关截距抽样估测面积的讨论。

sentences.english: As we estimate longer stretches of time, the range of errors gets bigger as well.
sentences.chinese: 当我们估测较长的时间时，误差往往也会随之增大。

sentences.english: In addition, the design must also take channel estimation and equalization issues into account.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外还有通道效应的估测和资料回复的等化问题。

sentences.english: More shelters will be designated once the government assesses the water level.
sentences.chinese: 政府一旦估测了水位，将选定更多的避难所。

sentences.english: It will be difficult to evaluate the complexities of the interactions in real diet situations.
sentences.chinese: 所以很难估测在实际饮食情况下相互作用的复杂性。

definition: to convert/conversion/(in accounting, referring to currency conversion) translation
